title: How to Make Holiday Pumpkin Punch

steps.headline: Mix 1 can pumpkin, 1 cup brown sugar,  1 tsp cinnamon,  1 tsp ground nutmeg, 1/4 tsp ground ginger, 1/4 tsp ground nutmeg and 2 tsp vanilla in a bowl.
steps.description: Make sure it is well blended.

steps.headline: Add 1/2 gallon apple cider and mixed well until sugar is dissolved.
Mix 2 liters ginger ale into pumpkin-apple juice mix right before serving.

text: Mix 1 can pumpkin, 1 cup brown sugar,  1 tsp cinnamon,  1 tsp ground nutmeg, 1/4 tsp ground ginger, 1/4 tsp ground nutmeg and 2 tsp vanilla in a bowl. Make sure it is well blended. Add 1/2 gallon apple cider and mixed well until sugar is dissolved.  Mix 2 liters ginger ale into pumpkin-apple juice mix right before serving.  Add ice and serve.
